Summary: after photo class in Ft. Pierce, FL-- outside classroom- 8 witnesses, when Delta Launch went off- 4 blinking starlike lights pulsating formation of rectangle, following rocket then disappeared when left atmosphere, then two showed up behind rocket.
divs: sighting detailsfour blinking pulsating lights maintained formation behind delta rocket launch- then disappeared abruptly and then two showed up again behind rocket as the rocket went out of atmosphere-- and then disappeard when rocket no longer seen. i got a bad headache afterwards that still hasn't gone away- sighting was in ft. pierce, florida- which is below melbourne, fl. eight of us saw the launch--three people questioned the blinking going on. someone in our group took an iphone photo\video, not sure if it came out.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Port St. Lucie
There were no other sightings in Port St. Lucie on or around August 7th 2013
